definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rebuke (Aram. [[גְּעַר]] g9ar id., Eth. ga9ara: cry out, Sab. [[יגער]] n.pr., Sab. Denkm. p. 29.30)—Is 17:13; [[גׇּעַרְתָּ]] Ps 9:6 + 2 t., etc.; Impf. [[יִגְעַר]] Zec 3:2 + 3 t., [[תִּגְעֲרוּ]] Ru 2:16; Imv. [[גְּעַר]] Ps 68:31; Inf. [[מִגְּעָר־]] Is 54:9; Pt. [[גּוֹעֵר]] Na 1:4, [[גּׁעֵר]] Mal 2:3; —c. [[בְּ]] except Ps 9:6, Ps 68:31, Ps 119:21, Mal 2:3 where acc.;—
rebuke, father his son Ge 37:10 (E), reapers Ruth Ru 2:16, priest Jeremiah Je 29:27.

of God rebuking nations Ps 9:6, Is 17:13, proud Ps 119:21, Satan Zec 3:2, Zec 3:2, [[חית קנה]] Ps 68:31, [[בָּאׂכֵל]] (the devouring swarm of locusts, restraining them) Mal 3:11, the sea drying it up Ps 106:9, Na 1:4, Zion Is 54:9; [[הַזֶּרַע]] the seed (prevent the usual harvest) Mal 2:3 (LXX Aq Vulgate [[הַזְּרׂעַ]], the arm, viz., of priests, that they may not extend it to bless).
